title: Honeycomb crunchies
description: Honeycomb is the most amazing stuff  – add the bicarbonate of soda to the sugar and watch as it explodes in the pan and grows before your eyes. The honeycomb is then mixed with melted chocolate, syrup and biscuits to make a sticky, crunchy square.
ingredients: flavourless oil (such as vegetable oil), for greasing
250g/9oz dark or milk chocolate, or a mixture
